# Sprite Assets

Place your generated sprites here. Recommended specs:

## Units (`units/`)
- `villager.png` - 128x128, transparent background
- `soldier.png` - 128x128, transparent background

## Buildings (`buildings/`)
- `town_center.png` - 256x256, transparent background
- `barracks.png` - 192x192, transparent background

## Resources (`resources/`)
- `tree.png` - 128x192 (taller), transparent background
- `gold_mine.png` - 128x128, transparent background
- `stone_quarry.png` - 128x128, transparent background
- `berry_bush.png` - 96x96, transparent background

## Generation Prompts (for Midjourney/DALL-E)

### Villager
```
isometric medieval peasant villager sprite, game asset, 128x128 pixels, transparent background, soft cel shading, holding farming tool, facing camera, single character centered
```

### Town Center
```
isometric medieval town hall building, RTS game sprite, 256x256 pixels, transparent background, stone and wood construction, top-down view, game asset style
```

### Tree (Wood resource)
```
isometric oak tree sprite, RTS game resource, 128x192 pixels, transparent background, stylized game art, single tree centered
```

### Gold Mine
```
isometric gold mine entrance sprite, RTS game resource node, 128x128 pixels, transparent background, rocky cave with gold veins, game asset
```

## Quick Placeholder Option

If you want quick placeholders, use https://kenney.nl/assets (free CC0 game assets)
- Search for "RTS" or "Medieval" packs
